opening: Hey there, Mamaroneck and Larchmont! Your favorite local guide is back with the hottest happenings around town. Get ready to mark your calendars because we've got a fantastic lineup of events that are sure to bring some sparkle to your week, running from September 20th to September 27th, 2025!

stories.text: First up, get ready to unleash your inner artist at the T-Shirt Design Contest happening at the Mamaroneck Public Library! Starting September 24th, teens can dive into a world of creativity and design their very own masterpiece. It’s free to enter, so grab your pens and let your imagination soar!
stories.image_desc: A vibrant, abstract design taking shape on a plain white t-shirt, with colorful markers and fabric paints scattered around.
stories.music_desc: Upbeat, catchy indie pop with a playful beat.

stories.text: Next, for all you little nature lovers and their grown-ups, get ready for Little Sprouts – Fall Fun at the Sheldrake Environmental Center! Starting Thursday, September 25th, at 10 AM, you can explore 60 acres of protected land, discover local wildlife, and enjoy nature-inspired activities. Best of all, it's absolutely free for two-year-olds with an adult caregiver!
stories.image_desc: A close-up of a child's hand gently touching a colorful autumn leaf on a forest floor, with soft sunlight filtering through the trees.
stories.music_desc: Gentle, whimsical folk music with acoustic guitar and a flute melody.

stories.text: On Monday, September 29th, at 10 AM, the Larchmont Public Library is hosting a Drop-in Coloring Hour! Children aged two and up, accompanied by their caregivers, can enjoy a relaxing time with crayons and coloring sheets. No registration needed, just drop in and get colorful!
stories.image_desc: A child's hands holding a bright red crayon, coloring a detailed picture of a friendly animal, with a variety of other crayons in the background.
stories.music_desc: Soft, cheerful children's music with a light piano tune.

stories.text: Also on Monday, September 29th, at 12 PM, for all you game enthusiasts, head over to the Larchmont Public Library for Open Play Mahjong and Canasta! Whether you're a seasoned player or just know the basics, you're welcome to join. Bring your own sets or use the library's. It's a fantastic way to meet new people and have some fun!
stories.image_desc: A close-up shot of hands arranging Mahjong tiles on a table, with other playing cards slightly out of focus in the background.
stories.music_desc: Relaxed, sophisticated jazz music with a smooth saxophone and piano.

stories.text: And finally, to wrap up our exciting week, on Monday, September 29th, at 3:45 PM, the Larchmont Public Library presents Afternoon Stories & Craft! Linnea or Kristi will be leading some fun stories and an accompanying craft for children and their caregivers. Registration is required, so don't miss out on this creative adventure!
stories.image_desc: A diverse group of children and their caregivers happily engaged in a craft project, with colorful paper, glue sticks, and glitter on a table.
stories.music_desc: Playful and upbeat acoustic music with a ukulele and gentle percussion.

closing: That's all for this week's event roundup! Get out there, have a blast, and make some amazing memories in our wonderful community. We'll catch you next time with more exciting events!
